member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationNotifications
member.summary: Specifies events which the invokes to enable developer control over the authentication process. />

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationNotifications.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new set of notifications. Each notification has a default no-op behavior unless otherwise documented.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationNotifications.AuthenticationFailed
member.summary: Invoked if exceptions are thrown during request processing. The exceptions will be re-thrown after this event unless suppressed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationNotifications.MessageReceived
member.summary: Invoked when a protocol message is first received.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationNotifications.RedirectToIdentityProvider
member.summary: Invoked to manipulate redirects to the identity provider for SignIn, SignOut, or Challenge.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationNotifications.SecurityTokenReceived
member.summary: Invoked with the security token that has been extracted from the protocol message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationNotifications.SecurityTokenValidated
member.summary: Invoked after the security token has passed validation and a ClaimsIdentity has been generated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelCertificateValidator
member.summary: Gets or sets the a pinned certificate validator to use to validate the endpoints used when retrieving metadata.
member.remarks: If this property is null then the default certificate checks are performed, validating the subject name and if the signing chain is a trusted party.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelHttpHandler
member.summary: The HttpMessageHandler used to retrieve metadata. This cannot be set at the same time as BackchannelCertificateValidator unless the value is a WebRequestHandler.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets timeout value in milliseconds for back channel communications.
member.value: The back channel timeout in milliseconds.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.Caption
member.summary: Get or sets the text that the user can display on a sign in user interface.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.Configuration
member.summary: Configuration provided directly by the developer. If provided, then MetadataAddress and the Backchannel properties will not be used. This information should not be updated during request processing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.MetadataAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the address to retrieve the wsFederation metadata

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.ConfigurationManager
member.summary: Responsible for retrieving, caching, and refreshing the configuration from metadata. If not provided, then one will be created using the MetadataAddress and Backchannel properties.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.RefreshOnIssuerKeyNotFound
member.summary: Gets or sets if a metadata refresh should be attempted after a SecurityTokenSignatureKeyNotFoundException. This allows for automatic recovery in the event of a signature key rollover. This is enabled by default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.Notifications
member.summary: Gets or sets the to call when processing WsFederation messages.

member.summary: Gets or sets the AuthenticationType used when creating the .

member.summary: Gets or sets the type used to secure data handled by the middleware.

member.summary: Gets or sets the

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.Wreply
member.summary: Gets or sets the 'wreply'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.SignOutWreply
member.summary: Gets or sets the 'wreply' value used during sign-out. If none is specified then the value from the Wreply field is used.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.Wtrealm
member.summary: Gets or sets the 'wtrealm'.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.CallbackPath
member.summary: An optional constrained path on which to process the authentication callback. Computed from Wreply if not provided.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.WsFederation.WsFederationAuthenticationOptions.UseTokenLifetime
member.summary: Indicates that the authentication session lifetime (e.g. cookies) should match that of the authentication token. If the token does not provide lifetime information then normal session lifetimes will be used. This is enabled by default.
